scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec tsx ./src/server.ts" "nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec tsx ./src/workers/importVideoWorker.ts" "nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec tsx ./src/workers/scheduleVideoWorker.ts"
scripts.start: concurrently "pwd echo 'Content of node_modules/@repo' && ls ../../node_modules/@repo && echo 'Content of node_modules/@repo/db' && ls ../../node_modules/@repo/db && echo 'Content of node_modules/@repo/db/dist' && ls ../../node_modules/@repo/db/dist && node dist/server.js" "node dist/workers/importVideoWorker.js" "node dist/workers/scheduleVideoWorker.js"
